segments.text: How come you have a locker but I don't ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . Rogers probably forgot to assign a locker to you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had to carry my backpack with me all day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Remind him to give you a locker tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . You have to buy your own . You'll have to go to a hardware store to pick one up .
segments.speaker: S2
